summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest, 45th Avenue Southwest and 46th Avenue Southwest, each from West Juneau Street to West Dawson Street; West Dawson Street, from California Avenue to 47th Avenue Southwest; West Brandon Street, from California Avenue to 46th Avenue Southwest, on the South; West Findlay Street and the North one-half of West Juneau Street, each from California Avenue to 46th Avenue Southwest; all in The City of Seattle; all in accordance with Resolution No. 6728 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
